name: Color Genius
description:
Color Genius is an endless 3D isometric puzzle game carefully designed with soft colors. Minimalistic user interface and simple mouse-only controls are included along with typical casual game music tracks.

The game is my first attempt of finishing something as big as game even if it has one simple mechanic in it.

Thanks for playing and waiting for some feedback! Feel free to leave a comment here or write your suggestions to my Twitter.
